original_text: Those other people speak about Christ because they want to seem important. They do not really want to help people. They just want to cause trouble for me while I am here in this prison.
korean_text: 그들은 나의 매임에 괴로움을 더하게 할 줄로 생각하여 순수하지 못하게 다툼으로 그리스도를 전파하느니라

sentences.original_text: Those other people speak about Christ
because they want to seem important
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 중요해 보이고 싶어하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: They do not really want to help people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 정말로 사람들을 돕고 싶지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: They just want to cause trouble for me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그저 나에게 문제를 일으키고 싶어 합니다

sentences.original_text: while I am here in this prison
